content.rendered: At Western Kentucky Dental, your oral health is the top priority of our caring and friendly staff. Dr. Pitcock and his staff will only provide you with the highest quality dental care available, while making sure that you are comfortable and relaxed throughout your visit. You will enjoy the beautiful, state-of-the-art facility that is conveniently located across the street from the new Wal-Mart in Bowling Green, Kentucky. Western Kentucky Dental is dedicated to helping you achieve your dental goals, whether they be regular cleanings and exams or cosmetic enhancements. Dr. Pitcock and his staff are ready to listen to your concerns, help you achieve a smile you can be proud of, and provide you and your family a lifetime of care.
